posts.post_title: Bump for new cards, scans and lower prices
posts.post_content: Have added more pics and lower prices.  Go get 'em.
Bump for new scans & 10 new listings.

I've created a new album on Net54 of Duplicate T206s.  My keepers (usually on top) and my cards for sale or trade (usually on the bottom) are both posted.  I will be adding prices to the ones that are available for sale or trade.  If both are available there will be two prices.  If a card is listed as not available, feel free to make a ridiculous offer.  You never know.  The scans are completed, but the pricing info is incomplete at this time.  A veritable Super Market for your Monster.  I'll continue to post new scans weekly in this thread as well until we see how this album thing works.  My collector focus Tobacco Road collection will be maintained as well.

Thanks for looking.  Prices include shipping.  Paypal gift, check or money order accepted.
Bump for new listings, scans & prices.

Hi Frank,
     I'll take the Schulte if you still have it.
Merrill
